title: Khadija and '78 Diary
marks:
Signature, title, inscription and mark
LRC in bla LRC in white script: [Peter Beard 205 W. 57 N.Y.C.
description: two prints, taped together at back vertically; left print: partial view of page and side view of pages behind; sliver fist atop pages; TLC, photograph of giraffe attached with paper clip; LRC, pink matchbook glued onto print; R print: collage of fashion photographs; photograph of a book at L edge center, extending onto L print; feather attached to print at LL edge
